TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectList extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<object>

Docs.summary: ObjectList represents a collection of objects. It is implemented as a List<object> in .NET 2.0 or higher and as an ArrayList otherwise. ObjectList does not attempt to be a general replacement for either of these classes but only implements what is needed within the framework.
